sentences: Tema laip oli teada, et meist keegi ei hoolitse.
Põhitõeline laipa kinnitas tugevalt oma panga seisu.
Laipa, keda kõik toetasid, kaotas valimised.
context: 'laipa' refers to a formal statement or declaration made publicly, often in a political or official context. It can also mean an announcement or proclamation.
